error: reCAPTCHA visual challenge - requires human intervention. Kaggle shows image-based CAPTCHA (select squares with motorcycles) that cannot be solved programmatically.
alternatives: 1. Manual registration with same credentials at https://www.kaggle.com/account/login
2. Google OAuth with opclawd@gmail.com (if Google account exists)
3. Kaggle API token can be generated after account creation for programmatic access
notes: Kaggle API (kaggle-api Python package) does NOT support account creation
Kaggle API only works with existing accounts using API tokens
Email registration is possible but blocked by Google's reCAPTCHA v2
